title: svatantara bhArata
sahitya:
svatantara bhArata rAjyalakSmI jaya jaya svarga rAjya rANiki jaya


anupallavi

  nirantaramugA prakAshincucuka nirmala vANiki mangaLam jaya


caraNam    sthavaguNambulu niNTina bhUmi shAnta jnAnambu paNDina bhUmi
shuddha shakti caitanyula bhUmi sundara mangaLa jyOtir bhUmi
